title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Hi can you republish the Nightmare AI mode? I really want to play it
doom bots?
Yeah I joined about a season after doom bots, and it looked really fun - and potentially frustrating

Why Riot, Urf was going to be on my holidays yet you schedule Dominion before it wtf. Dominion was the weekend after Urf yet you decide that Dominion has more priority and should be scheduled twice before Urf returns. Remember that Urf is the top wanted gamemode, followed by Doom bots, yet you decide that Dominion, the previous worst game mode ever (Draven day is now) should become before Urf #logic.
Definitely Not Dominion has only been out once, seems fair to have it return again before URF which has been out multiple times already in the Rotating Game Mode Queue.
Amen to that
not hexakill again. then dominion, riot please realise that people dont like these ones as much
Hexakill is my favourite of all the game modes though :D
yeah hexakill is fun, but 2 times in 3 weeks is a bit exessive. i dont mean that no on likes them but the majority of people don like these as much as they like others
Exactly he has a point hexakill gets boring after 5 games
Why cant I play one for all? Its been 4 hours, how is it live?

> [{quoted}](name=Jeffreyparkscole,realm=NA,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=b1LAtMbQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-17T06:33:26.063+0000)
>
> Why cant I play one for all? Its been 4 hours, how is it live?

The Rotating Game Modes go live with respect to each region's time zones, which is why it was live on Oceania before North America.
Can you do All for One Mirrored it was my favorite game mode DX
Urf?????????? Where's urf?
U;ltra rapid fire, no spell cost and %80 cooldown reduction lmao so just burstr everyone its fun as
Dominion is fucking trash...Riot, please remove dominion from the RGM for at least 2 months...
**Doom Bots of Doom** and **Nemises Draft** Pliz, **Black Market** was fun too. {{item:3903}}
HEEEEEAAAARRR!!!!
Please be urf after Definitely Not Dominion....it means I can play it a lot during my holiday weekend {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Jesus christ bring back Nemesis Draft or something. Hexakill was just last week and you're rolling it out again already, it just screams a desperation not to insert URF again but no damn clue what to put in because you're too busy not bringing back Black Market.
mak game at night it is looking awesome
RITO PLS, WHERES URF{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
everygame mode comes out 3 times besides urf WTF{{item:3070}}
Hey Riot what a lot of fans would love is if you combine game modes like one for all and urf or definitely not dominon and one for all together it will change the games up and people will like it
Is teemo still banned :c
I feel the best one for all modes involve mirrored champs, 10 of the same champs 5 v 5. It beats rolling the dice and either being steamrolled or steamrolling an enemy based on the matchup.
So can I play 1 for all Teemo?
